overview: Kenneth Grahame's celebrated children's tales of mischievous Mr. Toad return to life in this animated adaptation. The Wind in the Willows follows Mr. Toad as he purchases a motor car, and his pals Ratty, Badger, and Mole are forced to come to his rescue after a series of misadventures, as well as a brush with the law.
title: The Wind in the Willows
